name: set-http-proxy
content: def proxyUri = args.toURL(); def username = proxyUri?.getUserInfo()?.split(":")?.getAt(0); def password = proxyUri?.getUserInfo()?.split(":")?.getAt(1); def host = proxyUri?.getHost(); def port = proxyUri?.getPort(); core.httpProxyWithBasicAuth(host, port, username, password); println("Script set-http-proxy completed successfully")
